name: piefed
description: PyFedi is a Python-based self-hosted federated server framework that integrates ActivityPub capabilities for building social applications.

features.title: Activitypub Protocol
features.description: Federate with other ActivityPub-compatible platforms like Mastodon and Lemmy

features.title: Community Creation
features.description: Create and moderate communities for topic-based discussions and content sharing

features.title: Post Aggregation
features.description: Aggregate posts from federated instances into a unified feed

features.title: Voting System
features.description: Upvote and downvote posts and comments to surface quality content

features.title: Moderation Tools
features.description: Manage communities with tools for removing content, banning users, and setting rules

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Customize profiles with bios, avatars, and activity history

features.title: Cross
features.description: Comment, vote, and interact with content from other federated servers

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Configure post visibility and control who can see and interact with your content
